channel.title: Comments on: Day 21 – First Full Day in the New Digs – April 26

item.title: By: Ann montanari
item.dc:creator: Ann montanari
item.description: Sue B-- it's wonderful to hear of your progress! You've been a blessing in our mom's life and in ours. Sending loving, healing energy from our family to yours. Ann Montanari and sistets.
item.content:encoded:
Sue B– it’s wonderful to hear of your progress!
You’ve been a blessing in our mom’s life and in ours. Sending loving, healing energy from our family to yours.
Ann Montanari and sistets.

item.title: By: Debbie Pollak (daughter of Sarah Pollak)
item.dc:creator: Debbie Pollak (daughter of Sarah Pollak)
item.description: I am delighted to see Sue looking more like herself in this picture. Can she have flowers now? Please let me know. Thank you, Debbie
item.content:encoded: I am delighted to see Sue looking more like herself in this picture. Can she have flowers now? Please let me know. Thank you, Debbie
